%Puer Natus, cantus selecti p33

\beginhymn Puer natus.


\setgregorian1
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\nosolesmescustos
\initiumgregorianum
\musicinitial{\\I.}{P}%
\sgn {}U-\punctum K\egn
\sgn {}er\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn n{a}t\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}us\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}in\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn B{\'e}t\engl{\idx{A boy is born} in Bethlehem, alleluia:}\punctum N\egn
\sgn {hl}eh\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}e{m,}\punctum L\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}al\punctum K\egn
\sgn le-\punctum M\egn
\sgn l{\'u}-\punctum L\egn
\sgn ia:\punctum K\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
\sgn {}Un\punctum K\egn
\sgn de{}\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn g{a}u\engl{Therefore rejoice,}\punctum N\egn
\sgn det\punctum a\egn
\spatium
\custos N
\lineaproxima
\sgn Jer\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'u}s\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}a-\engl{Jerusalem,}\punctum N\egn
\sgn le{m,}\punctum M\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
\sgn {}al\punctum M\egn
\sgn le-\punctum M\egn
\sgn l{\'u}-\engl{alleluia,}\punctum M\egn
\sgn ia,\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}al\punctum a\egn
\sgn le-\punctum N\egn
\sgn l{\'u}-\engl{alleluia.}\punctum M\egn
\sgn ia.\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiofinalis
\spatium
\sgn {\s R. }In\punctum K\egn
\spatium
\sgn c{o}r\punctum M\egn
\sgn dis\engl{With joyful hearts,}\punctum N\egn
\spatium
\sgn j{\'u}-\punctum a\egn
\sgn bi-\bmolle b\punctum b\egn
\sgn lo{}\punctum c\augmentum d\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\custos c
\lineaproxima
\sgn {Chr}{i}s\punctum c\egn
\sgn tum\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn n{a}t\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}um\engl{we adore Christ's birth,}\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}ad\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}or\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'e}m\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}u{s,}\punctum L\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium
\sgn Cum\punctum K\egn
\spatium
\sgn n{o}v\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}o{}\engl{with a new song.}\punctum M\egn
\spatium
\sgn c{\'a}n\punctum L\egn
\sgn tic\punctum L\egn
\sgn {}o.\punctum K\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\Finisgregoriana

\bigskip

\beginlyrics

\hbox{

\vtop{

\hsize45mm

%\verse1. P\'uer n\'atus in B\'ethlehem, allel\'uia:\\
%Unde g\'audet Jer\'usalem, allel\'uia, allel\'uia.\\
%In c\'ordis j\'ubilo Chr\'\i stum n\'atum ador\'emus, \\
%Cum n\'ovo c\'antico.

\verse2. Ass\'umpsit carnem F\'\i lius,\\% allel\'uia,\\
Dei Patris alt\'\i ssimus,% allel\'uia,% allel\'uia.

\verse3. Per Gabri\'elem n\'untium,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Virgo conc\'epit F\'\i lium,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.

\verse4. Tamquam sponsus de th\'alamo,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Proc\'essit Matris \'utero,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.

\verse5. Hic jacet in pr\ae s\'epio,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Qui regnat sine t\'ermino,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.
%In c\'ordis j\'ubilo 

\verse6. Et Angelus past\'oribus,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Rev\'elat quod sit D\'ominus,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.

\verse7. Reges de Saba v\'eniunt,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Aurum, thus, myrrham \'offerunt,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.
%In c\'ordis j\'ubilo 

\verse8. Intr\'antes domum \'\i nvicem,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Novum sal\'utant Pr\'\i ncipem,% allel\'uia, allel\'uia.

\verse9. In hoc nat\'ali g\'audio,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Benedic\'amus D\'omino,% allel\'uia,% allel\'uia.
%In c\'ordis j\'ubilo 

\verse10. Laud\'etur sancta Tr\'\i nitas,\\% allel\'uia:\\
Deo dic\'amus gr\'atias,% allel\'uia,% allel\'uia.
%In c\'ordis j\'ubilo 

}

\hskip7mm
\vtop{

\hsize53mm

\it

\verse2. God the Father's Son did take,\\% alleluia:\\
A human nature for our sake,% alleluia, alleluia.

\verse3. Through Gabriel's message,\\% alleluia:\\
A Virgin hath conceived a Son,% alleluia, alleluia.

\verse4. Like a bridegroom from his home,\\% alleluia:\\
Proceeding from His Mother's womb,% alleluia, alleluia.

\verse5. He lies within a manger poor,\\% alleluia:\\
Who lives and reigns for ever more,% alleluia, alleluia.
%With joyful hearts, 

\verse6. And Angels to the shepherds say,\\% alleluia:\\
Revealing where our Lord lay,% alleluia,% alleluia.

\verse7. From Saba come the eastern Kings,\\% alleluia:\\
Gold, myrrh and incense offering,% alleluia, alleluia.
%With joyful hearts, 

\verse8. They enter in the dwelling-place,\\% alleluia:\\
To hail the new-born Prince of Peace,% alleluia,% alleluia.

\verse9. There is joy on this birthday,\\% alleluia:\\
Let us bless the Lord,% alleluia,% alleluia.
%With joyful hearts, 

\verse10. The Holy Trinity be praised,\\% alleluia:\\
Let us give thanks unto our God,% alleluia, alleluia.
%With joyful hearts, 

}

}


\endlyrics
